Checking to see if Docker is already installed

29th April 2021 at 7:07pm

You can check to see whether Docker is installed and running in the following ways:

Windows / Mac / Linux Command Line

From the command line, run the command (in any directory): docker -v

If Docker is installed, you will see a messaging identifying which version of Docker is available. The next step for you in the journey is: Obtaining the Module VCE

If Docker is not installed, you will probably see an error message.

If you do not know what the command line is but want to learn more, check here: command line
